document.full_text: every player looks to improve during his career, but the orlando magic would probably be happier if dwight howard, above in a dispute with the referee john goble, would stop his improvement at collecting technical fouls.
document.title: howard's other side
lines_and_colors: every player looks to improve during his career, but the orlando magic would probably be happier if dwight howard, above in a dispute with the referee john goble, would stop his improvement at collecting technical fouls.
